column3:
â€œGot this at Old Toby in Chehalis, WA. See pictures and detailed reviews on my blog the Aging Ent's Tastings --
Brand: Liberty Reach
Strain: Sin Valley OG Kush
Balanced Hybrid--Potency Analysis: TTL 24.2% THC 23.8% CBD 0.4%
--Cost: $15/gram--
It's not often that a basically perfectly balanced marijuana falls into your hands.  Yeah, that's how I'm starting this review out.

I've smoked lots of Liberty Reach and Jackpot...â€
â€œThis strain definitely gets the job done after a long day at work.â€
â€œGreat aroma and super clean high!! At 30% THC pretty euphoric high!!â€

â€œOne of my favorite ogs was super happy to hear they had this and a few other strains at dispensaries in Vegas. The smell is super potent and rock hard frosty body. Great for relaxing after a long day or for sleep. Truly sticky icky in all good ways.  Taste amazing in joints. Lasts all the way thru. Sinfully amazingâ€

â€œThis is a fascinating strain. You can achieve so many different goals like trying to sleep, creativity, euphoria and pain relief all by how much of the flower you smoke. I know that sounds a little silly because that can occur with any strain. The best analogy I can give is think of strains as colors. You smoke a green strain. The more you smoke the greener you feel. With Sin Valley OG it does not matter what color y...â€
â€œNice for relaxing to the point of drifting off to sleep...very little head effect.â€
â€œNo Pain, No Pain, No Pain!!â€
â€œone of my favorite when grown right, much like an old school, sticky, stanky, with a great taste to match, very stonyâ€
â€œone of my favorite when grown right, much like an old school, sticky, stanky, with a great taste to match, very stonyâ€
â€œVery relaxing almost instantly and sticks around for a while! Super dry mouth and eyes!!! but worth itâ€
â€œIt make me feel happy and ready for my dayâ€

â€œman oh man this strain right here is an amazing day smoke .... right off the bat its smooth with an amazing lemony taste that is sure to put a smile on ya face with every exhale... awesome heady high and all my stress n pain went with the birds after a few minutes of smoking this awesomeness. .... shoutout to BAM for another amazing hybrid and to Oasis for stockin that topshelf.... âœŒâ€

â€œBeen peepin' this beautiful bounty for about a week meow, and holy hell...
All I'm saiyan is fourth meal is about to be fifth and sixth!

Top 10 of the fiscal 2016â€
â€œVery sticky dense bugs and a very strong high. Highly recommendedâ€
â€œdank og BAM products always legitâ€

â€œI have chronic pain from severe scoliosis which was followed by 2 spine fusions and several surgeries with metal implants. I need pain relief! That's where this outstanding strain comes in. It starts with a relaxing cerebral high which allows me to be less focused on the nagging pain in every joint. Need I say more?â€
â€œVery relaxing almost instantly and sticks around for a while! Super dry mouth and eyes!!! but worth itâ€

â€œIf what you seek is relaxing, creative, or body soothing; this is for you. 
Whether it be musical, artistic, linguistic, or visually; this strain will boost it. I love it for when I need motivation to paint.â€

â€œThis was a time-slower for us which made a fun 1 hour high feel like 4 hours. It starts fun and social and giggly then slowly transitions after an hour or so to a heady thinker. Next comes the heavy body followed by an immediate need to sleep. The Sleep is deep and hella restful. Memory is spotty next day. For when you wanna have a good time but need to go to sleep in a few hours.â€

â€œNice buzz onset... not a long lasting buzz..
gives you a nice heady feel good buzz...smoke too much of it the indica kicks in and couch lock..I would try again
It made mouth dry tho...â€

â€œThis is an utterly common strain, looks good, smells okay, would not get a fly high. The stuff we got came from Mohave Cannabis and it was very disappointing since it was supposed to replace another strain that they grew that was absolutely great. We are what they call seasoned consumers and from our point of view this is just fluff weed, good only as a sort of marijuana helper.â€
â€œVery tasty, very pleasant head and body high. Sparks the creativity quite admirably. One of the best indica-doms I've ever smoked.â€
â€œthis strain was very well balanced and strong. easily a new favorite. I've tried 3 different strains so far from body and mind and they were cured perfectly.â€

â€œIt Nice and light at first with a touch of sweetness and touch of bitter. It's a welll round pinch of lemony fresh on the finish. The feelings sneak in slowly. It allows for a light and joyful effect surge of relaxation and allows those stresses to just melt away.â€
â€œGreat bud structure this strain has. A zesty lemon taste that is well enjoyed by me. I smoke a joint of this everyday before work n it keeps me zoned but still sharp enough to get my ish done.â€

â€œAnother Strain I'm trying out by BaM - Body& Mind.  Lovin their strains- just wish they would start packaging their product in glass jars !!! ğŸ˜
I will start out by saying this is 26.13 THC.

A very nice hybrid - a little bit sticky , nice aroma . Good for day or night time use .â€
â€œVery pleasant high. Head heavy at the start and slowly moving to a body high. Euphoric as any strain I've had. Tested at 22.46%. Highly recommended for anyone who' wants a balanced hybrid.â€

â€œAnother great hybrid balance!  Kicks in fast - I get that sensation in my eyes telling me it's working" while I'm only halfway into what I think I should consume. :-) This is a really contemplative
column4: insightful high for the first while - the kind where you just sit there and think.  Fantastic for listening to music or watching something intense
column5: as well.  As the head high fades I find I'm knocked out on the comedown....â€"

column3: â€œgreatest bud of all time. taste=5 effect=5â€

â€œGirlfriend and I both enjoyed the relaxing sensation we got and I noticed the pain in my joints, especially my shoulders became relieved tremendously. Only drawback was I totally coughed my brains out, could not get a smooth drag from this pre roll for the life of me. But the body effects are superior to many strains I've tried.â€

â€œBeing an indica hybrid, I chose this as an evening strain. It was recommended to me by the budtender as one of the better strains so I went with it. It's a stronger strain and I definitely suffered some couch lock, but that's fine, that's kind of what I got it for. Others say this strain makes them feel relaxed" and "euphoric" and I think that sums it up pretty well. Was nice to relax with while watching some tv and...â€"
â€œThis strain provides a relaxing high and I would recommend it for pain and also a sleep aid. I would recommend use for late afternoon or night time.â€
â€œA relaxing and euphoric high. Works very well for pain and tired muscles. Smells and taste sour and earthy. Very pungent! A pine and fuel taste on the exhale.â€
â€œVery strong hit, makes you cough hard, and if it's a realistic bomb strain, Harvey head buzz like GDP but this also gives u a headache and paranoid.â€

â€œCouldn't tell much of whats happening
But
I do remember hazily, all the amazing food i aye.
It does knock you off pretty quickly.
Doing a second round today to know more clearlyâ€

â€œGot this here in Colorado - 
Very Very pungent Woody smell - 
Easy Easy inhale - 
Very much a head high - 
Almost A+ - 
Highly recommended - 
Very creative strainâ€
